text.__SUMMARY__:
Albizia buntingii is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Venezuela.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Albizia buntingii". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T36587A10003611. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T36587A10003611.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
